programme.title: Spooky Season
programme.desc: The fog is rolling in, which means its time for the spooky season! But dont you worry, because youll be able to keep those ghosts and skeletons happy with all the spooky eats and scary treats in this episode of Tastemades Recipe Rundown!

programme.title: Hair-raising Halloween Cakes
programme.desc: Join Mia if you DARE for these Halloween cakes are sure to SCARE! Blood red velvet cake, marshmallow spiderwebs, bubbling caldrons and a cake that bites back will inspire some serious spooky vibes. Mia will seriously impress and teach you new skills

programme.title: Spooky Halloween Party Bakes
programme.desc: Make your Halloween Party the talk of every boy and ghoul in the neighborhood! Whether its the poisoned apples, the drippy candle cakes, coffin pies or savory treats (or tricks) these delicious bakes will surely delight and scare.

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! Its spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austins best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: Brooklyns Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes on the best pizza party crawl that Brooklyn has to offer. Hell try a Neo-Neapolitan pie, a classic coal oven favorite, hell hit up a modern joint with innovative toppings, and a cozy Italian-owned neighborhood spot.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Side Hustles
programme.desc: From a lawyer to an actor to an insurance analyst, Stephanie discovers a world of folks whove turned their passion for cooking into side hustle food businesses. From dumplings, sushi and pretzels she explores how they balance their day jobs.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Cooking with Fire
programme.desc: Stephanie meets 3 cooks who use fire in different ways to create distinct dishes. Using their love of cooking over an open flame; these cooks introduce her to the diverse flavors of Armenia; a classic Italian hero, and infrared grilled Brazilian BBQ

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza vans mobile oven.

programme.title: Life After Restaurants
programme.desc: From backyard mariscos to Cantonese remixes of British hand pies to made-to-order slap noodles, Stephanie catches hangs with 3 chefs who left the traditional restaurant scene and found alternative ways to cook for a living and make the food they love

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Home Cooking
programme.desc: From a homerun Greek dinner party series to a backyard thats become a gourmet deli to a Burmese pop up running out of an apartment kitchen, Stephanie Izard meets cooks finding ingenious ways to serve mouth-watering food out of their houses.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.desc: Bring your loved ones together over a delicious brunch spread made with love. Whether youre celebrating a major milestone or simply toasting to the weekend, Frankies money-saving menu will have guests buzzing for more.

programme.title: Tacos and Margaritas, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill hosts a heavenly girls night in, complete with sweet potato tacos with roasted corn salsa, carne asada tacos with orange And spice, and crab and shrimp enchiladas with chili verde. She tops it all off with a fabulous margarita station.

programme.title: Doing Brunch Right, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill brings big brunch vibes with her favorite weekend dishes including NY-style bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich with black pepper bacon, Maryland-style Old Bay crab cake benedict, coquito French toast bites, and a berry-ful Aperol spritz!

programme.title: Struggle Splurge
programme.desc: The key to treating yourself on a budget is to keep it simple: these elegant dinners taste like restaurant specials, but they can be prepared in under one hour perfect for easy weeknight meals for a family of any size on a busy schedule.

programme.title: We Knead Pizza
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, its time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, youre bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: Sweater Weather
programme.desc: The air is crisp and the leaves are changing, which means its time to gather round the dinner table for hearty, seasonal meals on a budget. These warm dishes are sure to keep you cozy all season long.

programme.title: Frankies Italian Faves
programme.desc: Everyone knows Frankie cant live without pasta, but this week he shares his favorite Italian recipes that dont require any kneading. Add these simple, delicious dishes to your weeknight menu to complete your Italian dish repertoire.

programme.title: Tacos and Margaritas, Baby

programme.title: Tacos and Margaritas, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill hosts a heavenly girls night in, complete with sweet potato tacos with roasted corn salsa, carne asada tacos with orange And spice, and crab and shrimp enchiladas with chili verde. She tops it all off with a fabulous margarita station.

programme.title: Doing Brunch Right, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill brings big brunch vibes with her favorite weekend dishes including NY-style bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich with black pepper bacon, Maryland-style Old Bay crab cake benedict, coquito French toast bites, and a berry-ful Aperol spritz!

programme.title: Loaded Dogs And Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to sample a modern spin on classic deli fare, heavily loaded low-riding hot dogs, frosty And fruity Taiwanese snow ice, and fancy French cocktails from a rotating carousel bar.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza takes a LOT of bites out of the big apple as he samples warm pillowy bagels And schmear, grabs pierogies at an old school Ukrainian spot, gets the scoop on innovative ice cream flavors, and slurps up some real ramen.

programme.title: Side Hustles
programme.desc: From a lawyer to an actor to an insurance analyst, Stephanie discovers a world of folks whove turned their passion for cooking into side hustle food businesses. From dumplings, sushi and pretzels she explores how they balance their day jobs.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Cooking with Fire
programme.desc: Stephanie meets 3 cooks who use fire in different ways to create distinct dishes. Using their love of cooking over an open flame; these cooks introduce her to the diverse flavors of Armenia; a classic Italian hero, and infrared grilled Brazilian BBQ

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza vans mobile oven.

programme.title: Life After Restaurants
programme.desc: From backyard mariscos to Cantonese remixes of British hand pies to made-to-order slap noodles, Stephanie catches hangs with 3 chefs who left the traditional restaurant scene and found alternative ways to cook for a living and make the food they love

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Home Cooking
programme.desc: From a homerun Greek dinner party series to a backyard thats become a gourmet deli to a Burmese pop up running out of an apartment kitchen, Stephanie Izard meets cooks finding ingenious ways to serve mouth-watering food out of their houses.

programme.title: Whole Chicken 101
programme.desc: Join Frankie to learn the ins and outs of using every part of a chicken, as he demonstrates how to maximize the value and minimize waste. By cooking smarter, youll have three delectable recipes to last you the whole week.

programme.title: Oktoberfest
programme.desc: Join Frankie as he shares his budget friendly takes on Oktoberfest-inspired dishes, perfect for celebrating the fall season with friends. These festive and hearty meals will keep you cozy and full, and best of all, pair nicely with a beer.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austins best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: Brooklyns Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes on the best pizza party crawl that Brooklyn has to offer. Hell try a Neo-Neapolitan pie, a classic coal oven favorite, hell hit up a modern joint with innovative toppings, and a cozy Italian-owned neighborhood spot.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Loaded Dogs And Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to sample a modern spin on classic deli fare, heavily loaded low-riding hot dogs, frosty And fruity Taiwanese snow ice, and fancy French cocktails from a rotating carousel bar.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: MasterChef India
programme.desc: MasterChef is a reality show that features amateur chefs and home cooks as contestants who battle for the MasterChef title. Stay tuned to find out who will be the winner of the title.

programme.title: Solo YOLO
programme.desc: Program perjalanan realiti mengenai eksplorasi solo ke beberapa negara, untuk mengalami keunikan pemandangan dan aktiviti tempat di tempat yang dilawati.

programme.title: Air Tangan Diraja
programme.desc: YM Tengku Maziedah Kaulah Binti Tengku Ahmad Kerabat Diraja Kelantan berkongsi 2 resepi Air Tangan Diraja iaitu Sup Labu dan Bubur Lambuk.

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Discover a variety of beneficial herbs as you explore Balik Pulau in Penang with the host, visiting eco-farms to learn the secrets to good health with the locals.

programme.title: Extreme Roadtrip
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan travelog yang akan mengikuti pengembaraan 3 sekawan menerokai tempat-tempat menarik di semenanjung Malaysia demi merealisasikan bucketlist masing-masing.

programme.title: My Hubbys Taste

programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: The Moon
programme.desc: An astronaut is left stranded in space because of an accident during a spaceflight. The former director of the space centre strives to bring him home safely...

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the targets large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Return of the Mafia
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: The Priests
programme.desc: After a girl is assaulted, two priests must determine if she was attacked by an evil spirit or a molester.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic head-to-toe plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: After barely surviving a violent attack by an elusive serial killer, a crime boss finds himself forming an unlikely partnership with a local detective to catch the sadistic killer.

programme.title: Nocturnal
programme.desc: After his brother Seok-tae returns as a bloody corpse, Min-tae discovers the death of his brother was foretold in a novel, and Seok-taes wife had a suspicious call with the novelist...

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: As the family celebrates their purchases of a new condo after 11 years of effort, the building was engulfed in a sinkhole due to heavy downpour.

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food, and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: The Ghost Game
programme.desc: 6 students head to an underground reservoir and perform a necromancy ritual, but nothing seems to happen. Terror unfolds when the ritual becomes a deadly curse and threatens their lives...

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming hes sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: The Priests
programme.desc: After a girl is assaulted, two priests must determine if she was attacked by an evil spirit or a molester.

programme.title: Dark Nuns
programme.desc: A boy is possessed by an evil spirit and his life is at risk. 2 nuns embark on a dangerous ritual and are determined to save the boy at all costs, no matter the risks or consequences.

programme.title: 0.0mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Punch-drunk Love
programme.desc: Bok-seo gave up to be a soccer player after an injury. He meets Bok-hee and falls in love with her. Bok-hee feels unsure but she appreciates his sincerity, leading to something special...

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: Return of the Mafia
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E089
programme.desc: Victoria decide aceptar la oferta de empleo de Sergio. Antonieta se encarga de informarle a Clementina que Felipe y ella se van a casar. Felipe le hace ver a Nicols que tarde o temprano Victoria va a encontrar la compaa de otro hombre que no es el. Yosmir le pide disculpas a Federico por el incidente durante la cena en su casa.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E99
programme.desc: Fernando amenaza a Jeli con quitarle al nio, pero Leandro le advierte que el es su padre. Fausto espera a su hijo Gregorio, lo golpea, lo bota de la casa y decide quitarle todas sus pertenencias y beneficios. Ezequiel opta por encerrar a Julia; Gregorio viene a llevarse a su esposa, los encuentra Celso, enfurecido y drogado, y los ataca hiriendo a la joven.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E100
programme.desc: Celso desquiciado veja y se burla de Fausto, este dispara al pecho del amante que cae al instante. Fausto va hacia su oficina, diciendo a todos que no ha pasado nada. Camila, en el lugar de los hechos, trata de convencer a Patricia que huya pues todo indica que ella es la asesina de Celso.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E119
programme.desc: Edilio is arrested by some policemen; Cepeda notifies him that Israel recorded the conversation they had in his studio the night before.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E120
programme.desc: Elisenda finds herself alone when she wakes up, and is surprised to find a note in which Pastora summons her to meet her in an abandoned factory.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E119
programme.desc: Maria Lourdes appears before Judge Echeverri and turns herself in for the crime of corruption and accepting bribes from Gertrudis; she hands over a folder with documents that prove what she says to bring Mrs. Corona down with her - Gertrudis scoffs at Albertos accusations and denies, once again, being a murderer. Alberto goes to the library, he cannot live knowing what his mother did and is unable to accept. A gunshot is heard and everything seems to indicate that Alberto committed suicide. Lorena, enraged, blames Gertrudis for what happened and the Chief corroborates the death of her son. Gertrudis falls to her knees, shattered, screaming like a wounded beast.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E96
programme.desc: Santiago le cuenta a Adriana que gracias al informe medico psiquitrico de Azalea, la juez acepto darle la libertad bajo fianza. Carlos Ral se presenta en ese momento.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E97
programme.desc: Carlos Ral, Cesar Romn y Francesca reconstruyen el atentado en contra de Azalea, llegan a la conclusion de que el cuchillo es el que dejo Nacho en casa de Francesca.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E089
programme.desc: Victoria decide aceptar la oferta de empleo de Sergio. Antonieta se encarga de informarle a Clementina que Felipe y ella se van a casar. Felipe le hace ver a Nicols que tarde o temprano Victoria va a encontrar la compaa de otro hombre que no es el. Yosmir le pide disculpas a Federico por el incidente durante la cena en su casa.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E090
programme.desc: Adelaida asegura a Hilario que lo odia y que ser ella quien lo castigue por el dao que le est haciendo. Antonieta informa a Florencia de que Victoria y Nicols van a pasar mucho tiempo juntos por cuestiones de trabajo. Yosmir termina su noviazgo con Eugenia. Clementina cree que Sergio gusta de Victoria. Nicols pide a Florencia se vayan al llano; ella cree que el ha empezado a corresponder a su amor.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E100
programme.desc: Celso desquiciado veja y se burla de Fausto, este dispara al pecho del amante que cae al instante. Fausto va hacia su oficina, diciendo a todos que no ha pasado nada. Camila, en el lugar de los hechos, trata de convencer a Patricia que huya pues todo indica que ella es la asesina de Celso.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E101
programme.desc: Patricia, llora, negando haber matado a Celso. Fausto manipula a sus hijos para convencerlos de que su madre es la asesina y debe entregarse. Camila declara muy elocuente su version de los hechos, y luego cuenta a Ezequiel que mintio para hacer pagar a Patricia por un delito que no cometio, tal cual se lo hicieron a su madre.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E120
programme.desc: Elisenda finds herself alone when she wakes up, and is surprised to find a note in which Pastora summons her to meet her in an abandoned factory.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E121
programme.desc: Raul asks his beloved if they can ever see each other without reproach; Clara invites him to hope that this dream can come true.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E120
programme.desc: Alberto arrives at the park where Lorena is with Norma and Ignacio. It seems to him that it is time for forgiveness and he tells her what he did with Claudio and Gertrudis, following the advice she gave him; now he feels relieved and ready to move on. Alberto, kneeling before her, proposes to Lorena with a ring in his hands. She accepts happily. "He who forgives offense, cultivates love..." End.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E01
programme.desc: Lorena and Guillermo argue in what seems to be their daily routine. In the back room of an antique shop, Claudio Corona hires a Mafioso to kill his brother Marco Aurelio so he can take possession of his goods. Lorena learns that her husband is a hitman. To recover her kidnapped son, Lorena must commit a crime.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E96
programme.desc: Santiago le cuenta a Adriana que gracias al informe medico psiquitrico de Azalea, la juez acepto darle la libertad bajo fianza. Carlos Ral se presenta en ese momento.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E089
programme.desc: Victoria decide aceptar la oferta de empleo de Sergio. Antonieta se encarga de informarle a Clementina que Felipe y ella se van a casar. Felipe le hace ver a Nicols que tarde o temprano Victoria va a encontrar la compaa de otro hombre que no es el. Yosmir le pide disculpas a Federico por el incidente durante la cena en su casa.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E090
programme.desc: Adelaida asegura a Hilario que lo odia y que ser ella quien lo castigue por el dao que le est haciendo. Antonieta informa a Florencia de que Victoria y Nicols van a pasar mucho tiempo juntos por cuestiones de trabajo. Yosmir termina su noviazgo con Eugenia. Clementina cree que Sergio gusta de Victoria. Nicols pide a Florencia se vayan al llano; ella cree que el ha empezado a corresponder a su amor.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E100
programme.desc: Celso desquiciado veja y se burla de Fausto, este dispara al pecho del amante que cae al instante. Fausto va hacia su oficina, diciendo a todos que no ha pasado nada. Camila, en el lugar de los hechos, trata de convencer a Patricia que huya pues todo indica que ella es la asesina de Celso.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E101
programme.desc: Patricia, llora, negando haber matado a Celso. Fausto manipula a sus hijos para convencerlos de que su madre es la asesina y debe entregarse. Camila declara muy elocuente su version de los hechos, y luego cuenta a Ezequiel que mintio para hacer pagar a Patricia por un delito que no cometio, tal cual se lo hicieron a su madre.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E120
programme.desc: Elisenda finds herself alone when she wakes up, and is surprised to find a note in which Pastora summons her to meet her in an abandoned factory.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E121
programme.desc: Raul asks his beloved if they can ever see each other without reproach; Clara invites him to hope that this dream can come true.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E120
programme.desc: Alberto arrives at the park where Lorena is with Norma and Ignacio. It seems to him that it is time for forgiveness and he tells her what he did with Claudio and Gertrudis, following the advice she gave him; now he feels relieved and ready to move on. Alberto, kneeling before her, proposes to Lorena with a ring in his hands. She accepts happily. "He who forgives offense, cultivates love..." End.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E01
programme.desc: Lorena and Guillermo argue in what seems to be their daily routine. In the back room of an antique shop, Claudio Corona hires a Mafioso to kill his brother Marco Aurelio so he can take possession of his goods. Lorena learns that her husband is a hitman. To recover her kidnapped son, Lorena must commit a crime.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E96
programme.desc: Santiago le cuenta a Adriana que gracias al informe medico psiquitrico de Azalea, la juez acepto darle la libertad bajo fianza. Carlos Ral se presenta en ese momento.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E97
programme.desc: Carlos Ral, Cesar Romn y Francesca reconstruyen el atentado en contra de Azalea, llegan a la conclusion de que el cuchillo es el que dejo Nacho en casa de Francesca.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E98
programme.desc: Carlos Ral deja en claro a Santiago que ellos no estn celebrando, pero al ver que Adriana est acompaando al abogado no puede controlar sus celos.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E090
programme.desc: Adelaida asegura a Hilario que lo odia y que ser ella quien lo castigue por el dao que le est haciendo. Antonieta informa a Florencia de que Victoria y Nicols van a pasar mucho tiempo juntos por cuestiones de trabajo. Yosmir termina su noviazgo con Eugenia. Clementina cree que Sergio gusta de Victoria. Nicols pide a Florencia se vayan al llano; ella cree que el ha empezado a corresponder a su amor.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E091
programme.desc: Cuando Victoria insiste en ir a buscar a Adelaida a Cantarrana; Carmencita se impone exigiendole que sea responsable con su nuevo empleo, aparte de que debe respetar las decisiones de su madre aunque no las entienda. Eugenia le confa a Leopoldo que termino su relacion con Yosmir aunque se niega a explicarle los motivos. Moncho avisa a Hilario que Florencia quiere verlo en el ro. Victoria le confa a Clementina que va a aceptar la oferta de Sergio segura de que con ese trabajo va a comenzar el camino que la llevar a quitarle Cantarrana a Hilario Guanipa. A Sergio le parece muy ambiciosa la idea de Victoria de querer comprar Cantarrana; sin embargo, decide confiar en ella. Nicols se presenta ante Victoria pidiendole le explique por que, si ella ya encontro un camino propio, se empea en destruir el de el.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E101
programme.desc: Patricia, llora, negando haber matado a Celso. Fausto manipula a sus hijos para convencerlos de que su madre es la asesina y debe entregarse. Camila declara muy elocuente su version de los hechos, y luego cuenta a Ezequiel que mintio para hacer pagar a Patricia por un delito que no cometio, tal cual se lo hicieron a su madre.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E102
programme.desc: Camila para hacer vivir a Patricia la misma angustia que debio sentir su madre; le ofrecer ayuda y luego la expondr pblicamente. Camila, posee el video grabado de lo ocurrido con Celso y la condicion para no entregarlo a la polica es que Fausto cuente como fue que incriminaron a su mam.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E121
programme.desc: Raul asks his beloved if they can ever see each other without reproach; Clara invites him to hope that this dream can come true.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E01
programme.desc: Clara Ines se defiende por haberse escapado, su nica intencion era buscar a su familia, los Santa Mara, noticia que sorprende a Valandro.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E01
programme.desc: Lorena and Guillermo argue in what seems to be their daily routine. In the back room of an antique shop, Claudio Corona hires a Mafioso to kill his brother Marco Aurelio so he can take possession of his goods. Lorena learns that her husband is a hitman. To recover her kidnapped son, Lorena must commit a crime.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E02
programme.desc: Guillermo tells Lorena that if she does not kill Marco Aurelio Corona, she will never see her son again. Lorena returns to Lucas and informs him that she was unable to kill him. As fate would have it, Lorena and Alberto meet again. Alberto is shocked to recognize Lorena and wonders how she ended up being his fathers personal nurse.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E06 - White Out
programme.desc: With still no big game in sight, Chris and Casey are forced to rely on fishing for food. The cold temperatures have slowed down the fish, creating challenges. When Mother Nature brings a brutal snow storm, the brothers are tested likenever before.

programme.title: Wardens - S03:E05 - Operation Wildfire
programme.desc: In this episode on Wardens, were on the hunt for a troublesome bear thats been rummaging through the neighborhood garbage. Meanwhile, in another area, were giving citations to a bunch of folks for fishing without a license.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S02:E01 - Ice Climbers
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation battles winter weather to ferry ice climbers onto the Knik Glacier.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E10 - Close Protection
programme.desc: From the elite ex-special forces personnel in charge of guarding heads of state in conflict zones to the two-person teams that protect CEOs in dangerous regions, modern day bodyguards must be well versed in close quarter battle techniques. An immense amount of planning and preparation is involved in each operation. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traffic, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation. This episode of CQB focuses on the complex day-to-day and minute-to-minute operations of these elite teams and the highly developed techniques they employ.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E02 - Meateaters
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea Pt2. Jim brings meat to the local village while Corey explores leech infested swamps looking for the local deer. Local villagers tell Jim of a remote area 400 miles away where buffalo roam.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E01 - Diana A Portrait
programme.desc: Diana, Princess of Wales, was incredibly enchanting and unforgettable, leaving a lasting impact like no other woman of her era. Known as a fairy-tale princess, a loving wife, a dedicated mother, and a style icon, this documentary digs deeper to uncover the true person behind the endless spotlight.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E02 - The Fergie Story Paradise Lost
programme.desc: When Prince Andrew and Sarah Ferguson tied the knot, she soon became one of the most popular women to be called the Duchess of York since the title was created back in 1385.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E07 - Motherly Love
programme.desc: After weeks of trying to survive in Saskatchewan, Chris and Casey have yet to kill big game. Time is running out as the bear begin to hibernate. Mental willpower is wearing thin. But a message from back home changes everything.

programme.title: Dropped - S07:E08 - Refuelled
programme.desc: A turn of events lifts the brothers spirits, but creates a huge hurdle they must overcome as they enter a new race against the clock.Chris and Casey reflect on the challenges they have faced so far, and the challenges that still lie ahead.

programme.title: Wardens - S03:E06 - Operation Trespass
programme.desc: Montana Game Wardens are keeping an eye out for people breaking hunting laws, like trespassing, hunting too early, hunting from cars, or taking spike elk.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S02:E02 - Without a Trace
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation pilots Joel Natwick and Josiah Freeman assist with a search and rescue for an experienced hiker deep in the winter wilderness.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E11 - Counter Terrorism
programme.desc: Following the September 11 attacks, military presence became commonplace in New York and other American cities, and the counter terrorism forces were effectively given a "blank cheque" when it came to ensuring that another terrorist incident would never take place on American soil. This episode of CQB takes an indepth look at who was selected to occupy elite anti-terrorist positions, what they were trained for, and how they were equipped: when opposing forces are using commercial airliners and chemical weapons, countermeasures are by necessity complicated and varied. CQB takes an intimate look at what it was like to be an officer on alert for chemical attacks in Washington DC, or an army reservist monitoring suspicious activities on the streets of NYC.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons - S01:E07 - Scoreless
programme.desc: Using a unique method to crack a safe, Nick Wells (Robert De Niro) uses a blowtorch to cut through a safe, fill it with water, and blow the door off using a small explosive device. We test this, along with the effects of a 20mm antitank rifle on a safe from the movie Thuderbolt and Lightfoot.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons - S01:E08 - Terry Vs Gorn
programme.desc: Terry and Larry test out Star Trek on the set of Star Trek Original Series set tours in Upstate NY Terry and Larry find them selves on board the USS Enterprise and they test the theory that Kirk could have made a cannon from a Bamboo tube Magnesium Powder and Stone Knives and BareSkins It worked on Star Trek but would it really work ?

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E03 - End Game
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea Pt3. Jim and Corey split up and search for buffalo. Jim, unable to reach Corey by radio, hears several shots from Coreys direction and heads out to search for his friend.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E13 - William And Kate One Year On
programme.desc: William and Catherine got married in a fairytale ceremony on April 29, 2011, with more than two billion people tuning in and celebrations happening all around the world.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E02 - The Fergie Story Paradise Lost
programme.desc: When Prince Andrew and Sarah Ferguson tied the knot, she soon became one of the most popular women to be called the Duchess of York since the title was created back in 1385.

This episode of CQB takes an indepth look at who was selected to occupy elite anti-terrorist positions, what they were trained for, and how they were equipped: when opposing forces are using commercial airliners and chemical weapons, countermeasures are by necessity complicated and varied. CQB takes an intimate look at what it was like to be an officer on alert for chemical attacks in Washington DC, or an army reservist monitoring suspicious activities on the streets of NYC.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E03 - End Game
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea Pt3. Jim and Corey split up and search for buffalo. Jim, unable to reach Corey by radio, hears several shots from Coreys direction and heads out to search for his friend.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E13 - William And Kate One Year On
programme.desc: William and Catherine got married in a fairytale ceremony on April 29, 2011, with more than two billion people tuning in and celebrations happening all around the world.

programme.title: The Wedding in the Hamptons
programme.desc: Jenna is a fashion designer who works for her friends boutique. Their failing business was saved by a famous influencer. When Jenna comes to a lavish Hamptons wedding, she was mistaken for her, but she decides to go along to save business

programme.title: The Marry Me Pact
programme.desc: Charlotte and Rory are best friends, and for his 30th he goes travelling around the world. A year later, Charlotte visits a psychic who tells her she is destined to be with Rory when he gets home. Rory comes home...but engaged.

programme.title: Loving Every Minute
programme.desc: When Stephanie inherits a watch, she learns that it allows her to travel back in time five minutes, once a day. But as she uses it more and more, her life, and romance with her coworker Hunter, doesnt shake out the way she hoped.

programme.title: Candid About Love
programme.desc: Laura, a gallery assistant and wannabe fine art photographer, is finally promised a spot in a Newcomers Showcase - but only if she can get a reclusive artist, Shane, to premiere his newest photographs at the gallery. When Laura discovers that Shane hasnt taken a new photo in ten years, shes determined to help him find his way back to his art whether he wants her to or not.

programme.title: Hashtag Proposal
programme.desc: A fake marriage proposal between two strangers . When all the attention starts to help them with their struggling lives and businesses, Millie and Leo play pretend, while trying to ignore their feelings.

programme.title: Modeled with Love
programme.desc: When model-maker Olivias dad is set to retire from their firm, she believes shes the obvious pick to take over. Enter Simon, whose big picture thinking threatens to upend Olivias comfortable bubble along with her role as successor.

programme.title: Deadly Secrets
programme.desc: When Jade finds out about her mothers financial problems, she joins her crush in a series of high-profile burglaries to pay off her mothers debts.

programme.title: Secret Lives of College Escorts
programme.desc: Eve and her friend sneak out for a party, but her friend winds up dead and Eve loses her college scholarship. Soon she finds a job to pay for tuition but her job was a front for the dangerous sugaring scheme that caused her friends death.

programme.title: The Royal Bake Off
programme.desc: The rivalries of bakers Allie and Marily intensify when the Royal Prince of Samavia rolls into town looking for a royal baker. When Allie and the Prince hit it off, it seems he might be in the market for more than just a terrific cake.

programme.title: A Royal Recipe for Love
programme.desc: When Emma, a baker in NYC, is hired to bake for the King and Queen of Sanovias anniversary party, she is convinced a good job will lead to her landing a cookbook deal.

programme.desc: Follows Stacey as she receives a pocket dial from her husband. She hears the death of a woman on the other end, and when her husband comes home, he says he has lost his phone.
